price: [Jesus said], “Indeed, Allah is my Lord and your Lord, so worship Him. This is a straight path.”
arabic: وَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ رَبِّي وَرَبُّكُمۡ فَٱعۡبُدُوهُۚ هَٰذَا صِرَٰطٞ مُّسۡتَقِيمٞ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
